set(clipp_ROOT "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/clipp-1.2.3" CACHE FILEPATH "Path to clipp root dir")
install(FILES clipp-1.2.3/LICENSE DESTINATION doc/license/clipp-1.2.3)
